My family is my biggest treasure.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I went to an interfaith event last year, and it was really wonderful to see people from different religions come together in prayer.
i take things very literally.

participant_2.background:
I have a baby shower to go to tomorrow.
my wife doesn t like me anymore.
i love to snack between meals.

content.text: Doing alright, just a bit stressed. I have a baby shower to go to tomorrow.
Oh, that's exciting! Do you know the couple well?
Yeah, we're pretty close. I'm actually really happy for them.
That's good to hear. I know a lot of people who have been struggling to have kids, so it's nice to see when it finally happens for someone.
Yeah, it's been a long road for them. But they're finally here, and I'm so happy for them.
I'm sure they're happy to have you there to support them.
Thanks. I'm going to try my best to be there for them.
I'm sure you will. You seem like a really good friend.
Well, I hope you have a good time at the baby shower tomorrow.
And I hope you and your wife work things out.
Well, I'm here if you need to talk.
